about_the_game:
The Aven Colony soundtrack was composed by Alexander Brandon of Funky Rustic in Austin, Texas. Alex has done sound design for many titles, including music composition for such hits as “Unreal” and “Deus Ex.”

The Aven Colony soundtrack was uniquely designed to blend between "environmental" themes with early-stage colonies, "glory" themes with large, thriving colonies, and "danger" themes for colonies in trouble.

Track listing:


  • 1 - Aven Colony MainTitle - The Farthest Reaches
  • 2 - Sunrise On Vanaar
  • 3 - Midday On Vanaar
  • 4 - Vanaari Glory
  • 5 - Vanaari Triumph
  • 6 - Daybreak Sandy Gulch
  • 7 - Sandy Gulch Noon
  • 8 - Sandy Gulch Rises
  • 9 - Sandy Gulch Triumph
  • 10 - The Final Words
  • 11 - Dawn At Azara Falls
  • 12 - Midday At Azara Falls
  • 13 - Azara Falls Glory
  • 14 - Veronika's Theme
  • 15 - The Return of the Seterdari
  • 16 - Sunrise at Hyla's Crescent
  • 17 - Hight noon Hyla's Crescent
  • 18 - Hyla's Crescent Sunset
  • 19 - The Expedition
  • 20 - The Last Words of the Seterdari
detailed_description:
The Aven Colony soundtrack was composed by Alexander Brandon of Funky Rustic in Austin, Texas. Alex has done sound design for many titles, including music composition for such hits as “Unreal” and “Deus Ex.”

The Aven Colony soundtrack was uniquely designed to blend between "environmental" themes with early-stage colonies, "glory" themes with large, thriving colonies, and "danger" themes for colonies in trouble.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card

short_description: The Aven Colony soundtrack was composed by Alexander Brandon of Funky Rustic. Alex has done sound design for many titles, including music composition for such hits as “Unreal” and “Deus Ex.”
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian
*languages with full audio support
